flawed_nl_solution:
Ajax weighs 80 x 2.2 = <<80*2.2=167>>167 in pounds.
He will lose 1.5 x 2 = <<1.5*2=3>>3 pounds per day.
So he will lose 3 x 7 = <<3*7=21>>21 pounds per week.
So, he will lose 21x 2 = <<21*2=42>>42 pounds after 2 weeks.
Therefore, he will weigh 167 - 42 = <<167-42=125>>125 pounds after 2 weeks.
#### 125

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 176, not 167. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
